# Reply format
Follow this reply format
```

<Deliverables>
  1) ---BEGIN PATCH---
     (unified diff for all files you changed)
     ---END PATCH---
  2) ---BEGIN TEST-RESULTS---
     (named tests + pass counts + the **actual printed snippets**)
     ---END TEST-RESULTS---
  3) ---BEGIN COMMIT-MESSAGE---
     (conventional, scoped, imperative; â‰¤72-char sub
```
